column4: I downloaded the theme Rpanther, do i need to extract the tar.gz?
just drag the tar.gz into the theme window
yes - lamp is for all unix OS
sudo apt-get install apache2 php4 php4-mysql mysql-server
well just install what you need
it keeps saying can't find php4
you need to update your repositories
you are using warty or hoary?
you should upgrade to hoary, but if you prefer warty you should learn about adding repositories.
where can i learn that stuff?
i just follow those instructions right?
yes.  Basically you have to change your repositories to Hoary and run some commands
